title: Augusta County: Mary A. Smiley to Thomas M. Smiley, December 21, 1864
summary: In this letter to her brother, Mary A. Smiley discusses the health of those at home, the lack of mail from her brother, and the status of the county's volunteer companies for the Army of Northern Virginia.
keywords: Home Front, Death/Casualties, Enlistment, Troop Movement, American Civil War
